An excerpt from Zen of Python says:

In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.

Summarises my journey in professional world. Succinct, Passionate, Efficient.

Graduated from College Of Engineering, Pune as Electronics major. Specialised in Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Computer Vision with working experinece ranging from MNC Société Générale to startups ShunyaOS and Sravathi.ai. Spanning several domains like Finance, Edge AI,IoT, Pharmaceuticals, Drug Discovery.
